scripts.build: fragments src/en dist/en && fragments src/es dist/es && cp -R src/assets dist
scripts.deploy-dry: aws s3 sync dist s3://liz-yoga-static-web --dryrun --acl public-read --profile dusan
scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync dist s3://liz-yoga-static-web --acl public-read --profile dusan
scripts.cleanup: aws s3 sync dist s3://liz-yoga-static-web --delete --dryrun --profile dusan
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run deploy
